bike.description: Full high modulus carbon main frame, stays and bell crank, Omniad Elite M30 lay-up, 100mm travel mp4 suspension, Press Fit 30 bottom bracket, 12 x 142 rear thru-axle dropouts, SST size-specific tube diameters, 1.5 - 1 1/8" tapered head tube, asymmetrical chainstays, stainless steel chain stay protector, cartridge bearing pivots, Rock Shox Monarch XX shock with Full Sprint hydraulic Xloc remote lock-out and 10mm hardware, replaceable derailleur hanger, Maxle Lite rear axle

components.description: Rock Shox SID XX 29 with 15mm Maxle Lite axle, tapered alloy steerer, external rebound, lock-out via hydraulic Full Sprint Xloc remote, Solo Air spring, motion control damping, 32mm stanchions, magnesium lowers, 100mm travel
FSA Orbit 1.5 Zero-Stack internal cup, for tapered head tube, 30mm shim stack
StanJAMIS_SINGLEQUOTEs NoTubes ZTR Crest 29 tubeless disc wheels, 3.30 Series 15mm axle front and 12x142mm rear hubs, DT Swiss Competition spokes
SRAM X0 mid cage rear and X0 front
Avid X0 hydraulic disc brakes with 180mm front & 160mm rear HS1 rotors
